distances module

Compute the distance between two airports.

distances.get_distance(airport1: str, airport2: str, df: DataFrame) → float

Get the distance between two airports.

Parameters:

  • airport1 (str) – Identifier of the first airport.

  • airport2 (str) – Identifier of the second airport.

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the airports data.

Returns:

Distance between the two airports in kilometers. If the airports are not found, return None.

Return type:

float

distances.get_point(airport_id: str, df: DataFrame) → list

Get the [latitude, longitude] of a given airport.

Parameters:

  • airport_id (str) – Identifier of the airport.

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the airports data.

Returns:

Latitude and longitude of the airport. If the airport is not found, return None.

Return type:

list
